title: Strengthening Business Strategy Practice Competencies: Online Library Utilization Master Course: Social Field Research Competencies

context.prior_knowledge: Completion of advanced studies and experience in executing high-level projects
context.additional_context: Practical competency enhancement program for corporate management/HR/administrative staff

learning_goals: Learners will apply academic database search strategies with over 80% accuracy via web-based tutorials in an LMS.
Learners will achieve over 90% success in simulating procedures to access library e-books/academic resources in mobile environments.
Learners will understand reference selection criteria for social science research topics and score over 75 points on quiz assessments.
After completing online tutorials, learners will present at least three instances of utilizing library resources when writing research proposals.

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
